== Palavayal (627148) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Palavayal is a village in the [[Hosdurg]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 2999 hectares and harbouring 2371 households with total population of 9923 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kanhangad]] is at a distance of 50 km. Male population is 4946 and female population is 4977. Scheduled Caste Population is 60 and Scheduled Tribes population is 1368. Census Location Code of the village is 627148<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 8466 (85.32%)
* Literate male population: 4259 (86.11%)
* Literate female population: 4207 (84.53%)
